content:
also available in lily / sugar n cream 1 available at favecrafts com 2 as day of the week bibs and booties
skill level easy **materials ** * 2 balls main color mc * 1 ball contrast a * size 4 mm u s g or 6 crochet hook * button pictorial of chain stitch along with days of the week is included in the pdf 1 https //www yarnspirations com/lily-sugarn-cream-everyday-set/scc0238-006022m html 2 http //www favecrafts com/crochet-for-baby/day-of-the-week-baby-crochet-pattern
